html:
2025-0910
2025-12-05ECCCCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999Order Approving the Interim Order Modifying the Operation of Certain Regulations Made Under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999Order Approving the Interim Order Modifying the Operation of Certain Regulations Made Under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999, made by the Minister of the Environment on November 24, 2025, in order to extend the Interim Order for up to one year, which (1) extended the suspension of the greenhouse gas (GHG) emission standards for trailers found in the Heavy-duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations in Canada; (2) updated the light-duty plug-in hybrid electric vehicle calculation reference found in the Passenger Automobile and Light Truck Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations; and (3) revised the “medium-duty passenger vehicle” definition found in the On-Road Vehicle and Engine Emission Regulations.N/A
subject: Order Approving the Interim Order Modifying the Operation of Certain Regulations Made Under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
precis: Order Approving the Interim Order Modifying the Operation of Certain Regulations Made Under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999, made by the Minister of the Environment on November 24, 2025, in order to extend the Interim Order for up to one year, which (1) extended the suspension of the greenhouse gas (GHG) emission standards for trailers found in the Heavy-duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations in Canada; (2) updated the light-duty plug-in hybrid electric vehicle calculation reference found in the Passenger Automobile and Light Truck Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations; and (3) revised the “medium-duty passenger vehicle” definition found in the On-Road Vehicle and Engine Emission Regulations.
